list.description:
#M48A1 #gunsight
sight made for the American tank M48A1 using HEATFS.
to install is simple
1: download the file
2: unzip it
3: go to options in the game, with the M48A1 selected, and in tank battle settings select "use alternative sight", put "add a grid sight", then go to the root folder of the game and place the unzipped file in the UserSights folder, replacing the file that was created, return to the game and press "Alf + F9", go again in tank battle settings and select "use alternative sight", and select "sight_1" if it does not appear, restart the game.
special thanks: TheGun31

#2poundergun #Sight #Historical_sight

No.30 Mk IV Telescope Sight for the Ordnance QF 2-pounder and used on the Crusader Mk II , can be used in conjunction with the follow vehicles. (though ever other tank that used the 2 Pounder used a much more simple sight that I will add later)

Best used with the Crusader Mk.II

file.name: No30 Mk IV Sight - OQF - 2 Pounder .zip

list.description:
#gunsight #sight #M48 #m48a1 #m48patton #m48_patton_iii

For other types of similar sights follow #Ometius93

The main numbers now follow the main range markings automatically, so you can use it for any tank you want.
Added code for the longer vertical line (last picture) for slower shells, if you watch the code there will be a "SHORT VERTICAL LINE" and a "LONG VERTICAL LINE", you can comment/delete the one you don't want, your choice (the default line is the long one).
Added a comment indicating that anything past that is code exclusively for the diagonal line, its range markings and the tex

A fixed version of my original sight, The M70F for M61 shot. Meant for the U.S. 75mm M3 gun

This version is compatible with:

M4A2
M4A3E2
M4A3E2 Jumbo
T34 Calliope (Not calibrated for rockets)

German Sherman (I think)

Check my profile for the version for the version of this sight for the low tier U.S. and British 75's in addition to my American 76's

Enjoy,
DannyPDX

A fixed version of my original sight, the M70F for M61 shot. Meant for the U.S. and British 75mm gun.

This version is compatible with:

75mm M3 GMC
M4A1
M4
T14

German Sherman (I think)

Cromwell V
Valentine Mk XI
Churchill Mk VII

Check my profile for the version for the late M4's and American 76's

Enjoy,
DannyPDX

Koreenium's TZF 9b gunsight.

Historical and functional gunsight for Tiger I Ausf.H, Ausf.E and Ausf.P ( panzerbefehlswagen VI )

Contains:
4 Mil (strich) and 8 Mil (strich) variants.
Version for both with and without nerfed field of view.
Historical version with moving center post ( center post with triangles moves downwards while adjusting the range) and a
user friendly version without moving center post ( center post with triangles stays in place while adjusting the range.)
.
.
.

#gunsight #sight #leopard #crosshair

Follow @TheGun31 for similar sights.

https://live.warthunder.com/post/673486/en/ <----- base sight, this sight only has an extra diagonal line for specific use for the DM13 APDS and DM12 HEAT-FS shells for the Leopard 1 and Leopard 1 A1A1 to counter the parallax effect while using realistic sight position (might work for other tanks with similar sight placement, but it won't be as exact).

**** DIAGONAL LINE ONLY ****

The DIAGONAL line and its range markings are specifically made for the DM13 APDS and DM12 HEAT-FS shells for the Leopard 1 and Leopard 1

**** DIAGONAL LINE ONLY ****

HEX.CO Mk.II H.V.G. Model Low Mag Scope - By Clonycommander
Fictional high velocity, low magnification scope

Based on the feedback from my first production, i upgraded the design and made it a little more role focused.
This model, is designed specificaly for high velocity guns with low magnification scopes, like the Sherman A1.
You can use it on vehicles without these requirements, but it'll bring some problems, like wrong placed numbers.
Low velocity gun, high mag and AA versions will be coming soon.

Features:
-Improved hexagonal design;
-Cross-free bar reticle for better viewing of the tar

file.name: HEX.CO Mk.II H.V.G. Model Low Mag Scope.zip

list.description:
Fictional useful radial sight made For the Panther II and for the KwK43.. You can use the game settings in order to set the range..
#panther_ii #long88 #88 #tiger_iih #tiger2 #tigeriih #tiger2 #tiger_iip #tiger_ii_h #tiger_ii_p #kingtiger #crosshair #gunsight #optics
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Questions? Ask in the comment section below.

СЕТКА ПЕРЕЗАЛИТА, ИСПРАВЛЕНА ОШИБКА с ОФС/file updated, corrected error with HE shell

#Т-10М #T-10M #т10м

прицел наводчика Т2С-29(поздний) для Т-10М/ T-10M T2S-29 gunner sight

сетка по мотивам реальной поздней сетки( у ранней не было дальномерной шкалы и цена делений была другая)

полного функционала прицела конечно нету, поэтому вертикальной подвижной шкалы бокового упреждения и нету, так же почему то прицел не дает крутить дальности выше 3км для ОФС и БКС.

дальномерная шкала взята из прицела для Т-64 за авторством BVV_d

для маководов что бы использовать сетку ищите в программах WarThun

#historical #gunsight #USSR #T_55A #историчный #прицел #СССР #Т_55А

Доработанный прицел ТШ2Б-32П для Т-55А от BVV_d https://live.warthunder.com/post/671684/ru/
Скорректированы толщина линий, положение и ширина шкал вертикальной поправки, дальномер ПВ и положение линии прицеливания.

Modified sight TS2B-32P for T-55A from BVV_d https://live.warthunder.com/post/671684/en/
Adjusted line thickness, position and width of the vertical scales amendments rangefinder ПВ and the position of the aiming line.

Just a simple sight, nothing historical.

I found targeting easier with the numbers directly next to the vertical crosshair and I know some others find that too.

There's also a range estimation guide, where every bar is 3 meters at a distance of 400, 800, 1200, 1600, 2000 and 2400 meters.

Downloading is easy, it's that green button you've probably noticed already.

Installating can be done in multiple ways, I found this way useful:
1 Unzip the file into your UserSights folder. You can find the .zip file in your downloads map.
2 Create a file for the default sight by selecting a vehicle in yo

M71D gun sight for the M1 76.2mm cannon.

Enjoy,
DannyPDX

M71D gun sight specifically for the M10 GMC in the American tree.

Enjoy,
DannyPDX

[Katyusha non-historical]

Decided to make the katyusha a little bit more usable and might do a few sights for some of the other rocket vehicles.

The sight is stadiametric and calibrated to about 6 meters which is the size of a Pz.IV broadside, though, as always with rocket vehicles, their sights are not going to be 100% accurate and this is especially noticeable with the Katyusha due to its under-over rockets and generally poor accuracy.

The sight only goes out to 1000m, but that's about the max you are going to get out of the thing. If people want if further then I can do so.

#katyusha

Sight for the Conqueror Mk. 2

This is/was its actual sight, so don't blame me for the minimalism, blame the brits...

I did size things up from the original scale (its ~4x scaled up), because otherwise this would be 99% unusable in WT...

#sights #gunsight #conqueror

Seriously, source is on page 97 though of this PDF: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4xitrrBUDsYUndsRmRfT29VTDg/view?usp=sharing
Fictional but functional radial sight for the Dicker Max

#sturmpanzer #brummbar
HE | HEAT
Аркадный пристреляный прицел для sturmpanzer II и brummbar.
Стандартный прицел делает гаубиццы совершенно бесполезными на дистанциях от 500 метров, поскольку при попытках пользоватся поправкой дальности - прицел начинает подвирать уже с 200м , и к 1000м дает недолет около 50 метров. Если не вводить поправку, стандартный парицел вполне работоспособен, но дальше 800 метров вы не прицелитесь, да и делать это без поправки, мягко говоря, неудобно.
Багрепорт на эту тему был сделан давно, но гайдзины пока не отреагировали, и неизвестно когда испарвят ситуацию.

В а

БР ОГ - использовалась для стрельбы бронебойными тупоголовыми каморными снарядами и осколочно-фугасными гранатами
